definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
to pray for luck and sacrifice to avoid disasters (i.e. traditional superstitions)

sentences.english: She smiled, blessed me and carried on with her round.
sentences.chinese: 她笑了，祈福保佑我，然後去繼續查房了。

sentences.english: How often have I blest the coming day.
sentences.chinese: 多少回我爲即將到來的一天祈福。

sentences.english: Tzu Chi prayer meetings promote spiritual peacefulness and consideration of all living beings.
sentences.chinese: 慈濟祈福會推廣所有人心靈平靜和沉思。

sentences.english: If you wish to dedicate more than one name, please use separate forms.
sentences.chinese: 如果迴逈消災祈福多名親友請分別填寫不同表格。

sentences.english: When worshipping in the church, she always remembers him in her prayer.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂做禮拜時，她總是在祝禱詞中爲他祈福。

sentences.english: Then he ate the meat and he blessed me.
sentences.chinese: 於是他把肉都吃了，併爲我祈福。

sentences.english: Spring flowers to the blessing of the goddess of mercy temple son, repeatedly throw st the skin have to Yin under the skin.
sentences.chinese: 春花到觀音廟祈福求子，多次擲下聖筊也只得陰筊。

sentences.english: Gone back in time to bless the child.
It is believed that the flags' good luck and prayers are carried around the world by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 據說旗子所帶來的好運及祈福會隨風飄送至全世界。

sentences.english: There is definitely something about this time of year that makes us sit back and count our blessings.
sentences.chinese: 一年中的此刻正該是我們坐下祈福的時候。

sentences.english: It blesses its possessor , and gives a large amount of enjoyment to others.
sentences.chinese: 它爲擁有者祈福，並且給予他人許多快樂之道。

definition: to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
to burn incense and worship Buddha
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
to worship/to make customary deferences to/a pilgrimage
to pray for luck and sacrifice to avoid disasters (i.e. traditional superstitions)
